name: ESCAPE SCARLET PRISON: It's cirno'in time
name_original: ESCAPE SCARLET PRISON: It's cirno'in time
description:
OH NO!!! CIRNO WAS CAUGHT BY THE SCARLET POLICE!!! Spongebob is very sad

No need to worry tho! You random person on the internet can help Cirno escape prison and lead her to freedom!

PLAY NOW!!! AND LET THE FUNKY FUNK ON THE FUNKY FUNK!!!!

           breaking fumo

"When I played this game all my bullies disappeared, my crush married me, and my father came back with the milk so you should all play this amazing game now"
- Quandale Dingle "I will make it mandatory that everyone in America should play this very cool game!!!"
- Joe Biden "This  game is up to Los Pollos Hermanos standards :)"
- Gus Fring "wtf is this game its total trash."
- (Eyeballs were unable to be found. The victim was found lying on the carpet. Causes of death unknown, handmarks with unidentifiable fingerprints were found all over the corpse.)

oh yeah and make sure you hit menu when exiting or it won't save (checkpoints don't count only levels)
